overview: I am Celine Markan, I am a sexologist and I have spent the last 5 years helping hundreds of couples, but without realizing it, my only sexuality has become that of others. the advice I gave to my own patients: sexual liberation, swinging, submission, voyeurism … I turned into a femme fatale and he into a real stallion. Between the hot fucks with my former patients and the exploits of my lovers.
title: The Therapist
